title: Day Spa
description: Rejuvenate your body, mind and spirit
cleaned_text: Rejuvenate Your Body, Mind and Spirit Rest is powerful. It refreshes, rejuvenates and rebuilds the mind, body and spirit. Rest empowers you to function at your best. The Day Spa at AdventHealth Celebration features a full array of luxurious spa services, organic spa products and healing spa treatments designed to nourish the whole person. Choose from massage therapy, facials, waxing, body wraps, and acupuncture. In this healing environment, you can rest, relax and let stress float away. Energize your senses and find inner peace. Spa Services - Massage Therapy - Facials - Body Treatments - Waxing Services - Enhancements The Day Spa Join the Spa Club and enjoy one spa treatment*, exclusive spa discounts* and a FREE monthly spa gift! Members also receive access to the on-site Fitness Centre on the day of service. Child care is also available for a nominal fee. Start experiencing your monthly escape today! For just $69 a month, unwind with one of the following spa services: - Paradise Massage - Purifying Facial - Deep Cleansing Back Treatment - Sweet Bliss Sugar Scrub *Must be 18 years or older to be a member. Non-transferable. 6-month minimum commitment and 30-day cancellation required. 18% gratuity will be added the day of your spa treatment. Membership is based on $69/month fee, billed monthly. Additional spa services are at a 20% discount for members. See spa for details.
